prompt: Image Prompt: Create an artistic depiction of Jesus Christ in a universal form, symbolizing his message of love and compassion transcending all races and ethnicities. Show Jesus with a diverse blend of features, representing unity and inclusivity among people of various backgrounds. Incorporate elements like a globe or diverse group of individuals to emphasize the idea of Jesus' teachings reaching and embracing people from all corners of the world. The image should convey a sense of harmony, diversity, and spiritual connection.
